channel.title: Aurelia's Journal
channel.description:
"The morning arose, Chaos spread in the halls, as the people saw a dead body carried in.. as the king looked, his eyes glanced everyone who was there, as he decided to guard himself this night." "However, people started to appoint each other; "You Did it!, no YOU did it!" and as chaos spread, the killer remained silent. smirking ever so slightly. Would the truth be unveiled?. Soon enough it would be revealed. And when I will be revealed. You'll understand why"
"How did I know when people died? and had everything typed?... it turns out.. that I am the mastermind.
as you uncover the truth, you realize that you are part of a game, and yet. you figured that i had it in control all the time. I AM THE MASTERMIND I AM THE NARRATOR. You are being NARRATED; BE UNDER MY ABSOLUTE CONTROL You're my puppets, you're dictated by a linear story. that always goes one way... you listen to me, therefore. you think is good...

item.description:
No, everything on the internet is permanent I thought

Read full topic

I AM THE MASTERMIND
